title: An 'Analog' Process Needing a Digital Intelligence Upgrade
subtitle: Clinical trials are plagued by inefficiencies that cost billions and delay life-saving treatments

cards.title: Catastrophically Slow
cards.description:
Catastrophically Slow

Trapped in manual processes, losing 12-18 months per trial to unnecessary planning & operational delays.  Delays cost millions (Avg $40K/day in Phase 3).

cards.title: Wastefully Expensive
cards.description:
Wastefully Expensive

Inefficient trial execution contributes to $2.6B cost per approved drug.

cards.title: Operationally Blind
cards.description: Increasing trial complexity & overwhelming literature volume overtakes critical insights

cards.title: Coordination Chaos
cards.description:
Coordination Chaos

Drowning in 15+ disconnected stakeholders with no central coordination - designs do not get the necessary inputs for feasibility

cards.title: Opaque
cards.description: Black-box decision making without audit trails. Volume of information means research isn't exhaustive.
